entities.name: sorting hat
entities.description: The Sorting Hat is a magical object that sorts students into Hogwarts Houses. It has become motionless and started singing a new song.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is clapping along with everyone else in the Great Hall. He knows what others are talking about.

relationships.description: The Sorting Hat sings a new song and gives advice to Harry, who is clapping along with everyone else.
Harry talks to Ron about the Sorting Hat's new song.
